text: "Mirror Mirror" is a 1995 song recorded by Swedish-Norwegian Eurodance group Solid Base. It is one of their most popular songs and is taken from the group's debut album, Finally. The song is sung by lead vocalist Isabelle Heitman, who also co-wrote the lyrics and features rap by rapper Thomas Nordin AKA Teo T. The single was a big hit in Norway, where it peaked at number 6 and sold to gold. ==Track listing== ==Chart performance== ===Weekly charts=== {|class="wikitable sortable" ! Chart (1995) ! Peak position |- |- |} ==References== Category:1995 singles Category:1995 songs Category:Solid Base songs Category:English-language Norwegian songs
title: Mirror Mirror (Solid Base song)
